Sentencas: Based on advanced plasma deposition technology with both DC and RF plasmas DLR Stuttgart has developed a concept of a planar SOFC with consecutive deposition of all layers of a thin-film cell onto a porous metallic substrate support.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: This concept is a in alternative approach to conventionally used sintering techniques for SOFC fabrication without needing any sintering steps or other thermal post-treatment.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: Furthermore, is has the potential to be developed into an automated continous production process.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: For both stationary and mobile applications, adequate stack designs and stack technologies have been developed.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: Future development work will focus on light-weight stacks to be applied as an Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) for on-board electricity supply in passenger cars and airplanes.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: This paper describes the plasma deposition technologies used for cell fabrication and the DLR spray concept including the resulting stack designs.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies

Sentencas: The current status of development and recent progress with respect to materials development and electrochemical characterization of single cells and short-stacks is presented.
Titulo: Development of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Applying DC and RF Plasma Deposition Technologies
